1.title: Meet Old Hickory

episode of.title: The Adventures of Old Hickory and Me (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: Introduction to the Old Hickory Knife and some modifications to it.

2.title: What's Batoning?

episode of.title: The Adventures of Old Hickory and Me (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: I use my Old Hickory knife to section up a log. After that I use it to get dry firewood from a piece of wood.

3.title: Tent Stakes and Toggles

episode of.title: The Adventures of Old Hickory and Me (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: I use the sticks that were batoned in episode 2 and turn them into tent stakes. I also show some other useful notches.

4.title: The 3 F's Fat Wood, Ferro Rods and Fuzz Sticks

episode of.title: The Adventures of Old Hickory and Me (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: First fire making in the series. I use the wood batoned from episode 2 to make fuzz sticks. After that I use some fat wood shavings and a Ferrocerium rod to start a fire. I then use the fuzz sticks as kindling to keep the fire going.

5.title: Char, Flint, Tinder, FIRE!

episode of.title: The Adventures of Old Hickory and Me (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: I show a lot of fire making materials and techniques from making char cloth, cattail, punk wood, and fungus to using it with a piece of flint and a tinder bundle to start a fire.

6.title: Let's Get Primitive with Fire

episode of.title: The Adventures of Old Hickory and Me (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: Using my Old Hickory and some bankline, I make a bow drill set for creating a fire.

7.title: Rub 2 Sticks Together and Get What?

episode of.title: The Adventures of Old Hickory and Me (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: Using the bow drill I created in the last episode, I show the proper way to use it to start a fire.

8.title: Do You Know Roy Croft?

episode of.title: The Adventures of Old Hickory and Me (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: I use my Old Hickory to construct a Roy Croft pack frame. Along with a piece of rope and a tarp you can use it as a pack.

9.title: Just Old Hickory and Me

episode of.title: The Adventures of Old Hickory and Me (TV Series 2014– )

9.plot: I head out alone with just my Old Hickory and the clothes on my back for a night in the woods.

10.title: Day 2

episode of.title: The Adventures of Old Hickory and Me (TV Series 2014– )

10.plot: Day 2 of my solo overnight survival experiment.

imdb.title: The Adventures of Old Hickory and Me
akas: The Adventures of Old Hickory and Me (United States)
